name: Brain Puzzle: 99 Games
description:
Ready!? Set! SOLVE! Are YOU the SMARTEST?! Smarter than your friends? Want to quiz your mom? Don't be dumb, test your ability with this new game by Gamejam!

Boost your IQ with these BRAIN challenging mini games now! Prove you have the highest IQ once and for all! Take that Albert Einstein!

Shoot, sort, save, solve and stomp your way to victory, through these MEGA fun-packed BIG BRAIN BOOSTING mini game challenges!

Can you beat them all!?

Let us know if you can!
If you have any questions or comments, feel free to contact us at: hello@gamejam.co
